languages.text: "Когда же на Эурак-V синий лед моей души заставил сердце Фелека остановиться... Я сразу все поняла. И лгать себе было уже бессмысленно".

traits.locale_text: "Когда же на Эурак-V синий лед моей души заставил сердце Фелека остановиться... Я сразу все поняла. И лгать себе было уже бессмысленно".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."
languages.original_text: "Когда же на Эурак-V синий лед моей души заставил сердце Фелека остановиться... Я сразу все поняла. И лгать себе было уже бессмысленно".

traits.locale_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac-V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac-V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac-V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “在欧拉克五号星站上，当我灵魂中黑蓝色的坚冰扼住了费雷克的心跳时……我立刻意识到了真相。到了那个时候，我已经没办法继续骗自己了。”
languages.original_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."

traits.locale_text: “在欧拉克五号星上，当我灵魂中黑蓝色的坚冰扼住了费雷克的心跳时……我立刻意识到了真相。到了那个时候，我已经没办法继续骗自己了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."

languages.text: «Cuando el hielo azul oscuro de mi alma detuvo el corazón de Felek en Eurac V... lo supe al instante. Para entonces ya no tenía sentido mentirme a mí misma».
languages.original_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando el hielo azul oscuro de mi alma detuvo el corazón de Felek en Eurac-V... lo supe al instante. Para entonces ya no tenía sentido mentirme a mí misma».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私の魂のダークブルーの氷が、ユーラック・Vでフェレックの心臓を止めたとき…瞬時にわかったのです。その時、自分に嘘をつく意味がなくなりました」
languages.original_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."

traits.locale_text: 「私の魂のダークブルーの氷が、ユーラック・Vでフェレックの心臓を止めたとき…瞬時にわかったのです。その時、自分に嘘をつく意味がなくなりました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Als das dunkelblaue Eis meiner Seele Feleks Herz auf Eurac V verstummen ließ ... Da wusste ich es sofort. Und ab da war es zwecklos, mich selbst zu belügen."
languages.original_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."

traits.locale_text: "Als das dunkelblaue Eis meiner Seele Feleks Herz auf Eurac-V verstummen ließ ... Da wusste ich es sofort. Und ab da war es zwecklos, mich selbst zu belügen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Quand la glace bleu foncé de mon âme a arrêté le cœur de Felek sur Eurac-V... j'ai tout de suite su. Continuer à me voiler la face n'aurait rien apporté de bon. »
languages.original_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."

traits.locale_text: « Quand la glace bleu foncé de mon âme a arrêté le cœur de Felek sur Eurac-V... j'ai tout de suite su. Continuer à me voiler la face n'aurait rien apporté de bon. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ruhumdaki lacivert buz yüzünden Eurac V'te Felek'in kalbi durunca... O zaman hemen anladım. Artık kendi kendime yalan söylememin bir anlamı kalmamıştı."
languages.original_text: "When the dark blue ice of my soul made Felek's heart stop on Eurac V... I instantly knew. And by then there was no sense in lying to myself."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhumdaki lacivert buz yüzünden Eurac V'te Felek'in kalbi durunca... İşte o zaman hemen anladım. Artık kendi kendime yalan söylememin bir anlamı kalmamıştı."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
